In England, in the seven days to 10 March, there were 33,016 new confirmed cases (58.7 new cases per 100,000). In the seven days to 03 March, there were 37,245 new cases, and so the new cases have decreased by 11% (4,229 fewer cases). The number of confirmed COVID-19 cases in England so far as at 15 March is 3,731,849 (6,630 cases per 100,000 population).
